title: Andy Beshear
added: '''Andrew Graham Beshear''' (born November 29, 1977) is an American attorney and politician. Since December 2019, he has served as the 63rd [[Governor of Kentucky]]. A member of the [[Democratic Party (United States)|Democratic Party]], he is the son of [[Steve Beshear|Steve]] and Jane Klingner Beshear, the 61st Governor and first lady of Kentucky.

Beshear was elected [[Attorney General of Kentucky|attorney general of Kentucky]] in November 2015. As attorney general, Beshear sued Governor [[Matt Bevin]] several times over issues such as health care and pensions, before challenging and narrowly defeating Bevin in the [[2019 Kentucky gubernatorial election|2019 gubernatorial election]]. An Impeachment Committee was formed in January 2021 to investigate charges of abuse of power against Beshear related to his controversial executive actions related to the Covid-19 pandemic.
